entries.name: digest_obj << string → digest_objclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Updates the digest using a given string and returns self.

entries.name: digest_obj == another_digest_obj → booleanclick to toggle source
base64digest(str = nil)
entries.desc: If none is given, returns the resulting hash value of the digest in a base64 encoded form, keeping the digest's state.

entries.name: base64digest!()
entries.desc: Returns the resulting hash value and resets the digest to the initial state.

entries.name: block_length → integerclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the block length of the digest.

entries.name: bubblebabble → hash_stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the resulting hash value in a Bubblebabble encoded form.

entries.name: digest! → stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the resulting hash value and resets the digest to the initial state.

entries.name: digest_length → integerclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the length of the hash value of the digest.

entries.name: file(name)
entries.desc: Updates the digest with the contents of a given file name and returns self.

entries.name: hexdigest! → stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the resulting hash value in a hex-encoded form and resets the digest to the initial state.

entries.name: inspect → stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Creates a printable version of the digest object.

entries.name: new → another_digest_objclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a new, initialized copy of the digest object.  Equivalent to digest_obj.clone().reset().

entries.name: reset → digest_objclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Resets the digest to the initial state and returns self.

entries.name: update(string) → digest_objclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Updates the digest using a given string and returns self.
